name: mapillary_sprite_source
description: Source repository of `svg` files to generate sprites for mapillary.com

scripts.prepare: mkdir -p bundle && mkdir -p .tmp && cp -r ./package_* .tmp && mkdir -p sprites && npm run flatten
scripts.generate:all: cd sprites && spritezero sprites ../bundle && spritezero sprites@2x ../bundle --retina
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run prepare && npm run generate:all
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && browserify -t brfs --standalone mapillary_sprite_source index.js > dist/index.js && cp index.d.ts dist/

author: Kamil Nikel
